summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Police Department; authorizing execution of a supplemental agreement with the Office of Community Oriented Policing Services, United States Department of Justice for additional financial assistance to evaluate the effectiveness of problem-solving partnerships established between the community and the Police Department to address a persistent crime or disorder problem; accepting the money when received; increasing the 1997 Budget of the Police Department; ratifying and confirming prior acts; and making a reimbursable appropriation therefor, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
